an3.67:1.8: evaṁ hoti etarahi paccuppannamaddhānan’ti → evaṁ etarahi paccuppannanti (bj, pts1ed, mr); evaṁ hoti etarahi paccuppannanti (sya-all, km)
an3.67:2.2: ṭhapanīyaṁ pañhaṁ na ṭhapeti → thapanīyaṁ pañhaṁ na thapeti (mr)
an3.67:3.2: aññātavāde → aññavāde (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed); aññātavāre (mr)
an3.67:8.4: tadariyo kathanācare → tadariyo na kathaṁ vade (mr)
